entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 2:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -21.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -29.4°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
